intro: The iconic murder mystery classic’s first foray on Nintendo Switch™ – Clue/Cluedo: Classic Edition! Roll the dice, explore the mansion and solve the mystery.
description:
The original murder mystery invites you to a dinner party to die for…

Step into the shoes of your favourite cast of criminally classy characters and explore the iconic rooms of the Tudor Mansion, rendered in stunning 3D. 

Was it Miss Scarlett with the Candlestick in the Ballroom? Maybe Professor Plum with the Dagger in the Conservatory? Perhaps Colonel Mustard with the Lead Pipe in the Dining Room, or Mrs Peacock with the Revolver in the Lounge? Could it be Reverend Green with the Rope in the Library? Or Dr Orchid with the Wrench in the Study…? 

Play against challenging AI opponents, or go online to challenge Clue/Cluedo fans from around the world. You can even set up a nostalgic games night with your friends and family in Private Multiplayer! 

Whodunit? With what weapon? Where? There’s six suspects, six weapons, nine rooms, and only one answer…

HOW TO PLAY CLUE/CLUEDO: CLASSIC EDITION: 

Three cards are hidden away at the start of the game – these cards are the solution to the crime.
Each player gets three Clue Cards. These can’t be part of the solution, so they are automatically crossed off your clue sheet. 
Roll the dice and move your token around the board.
If you choose to enter a room, you can make a suggestion. Pick who you think committed the crime, with what weapon and where. 
Each player then takes it in turn to compare your suggestion against the cards they hold. If they have a card that features in your suggestion, they’ll tell you. 
Cross off any cards other players have shown you and whittle down your list of suspects.
When you are ready, you can make an accusation! If your accusation is wrong, you’re out of the game!

FEATURES
CROSS-PLATFORM MULTIPLAYER – Play with your friends and family, whatever their favourite gaming platform!
ONLINE LEADERBOARDS – Outsmart fans around the world with weekly online leaderboards.
MULTIPLE MODES – Face up to six players in Online Multiplayer, or take on customisable AI suspects in Single Player Mode. 
PRIVATE LOBBIES – Set up a family game night easily with the Play with Friends Mode.

Catch the criminal! Play Clue/Cluedo: Classic Edition today!
